item.title: Bootstrapped founder builds an AI app with Supabase and scales to $1M in 5 months
item.description: How Yasser leveraged Supabase to build Chatbase and became one of the most successful single-founder AI products.

item.title: Quivr launch 5,000 Vector databases on Supabase.
item.description: Learn how one of the most popular Generative AI projects uses Supabase as their Vector Store.

item.title: Berri AI boosts productivity by migrating from AWS RDS to Supabase Vector
item.description: Learn how Berri AI overcame challenges with self-hosting their vector database on AWS RDS and successfully migrated to Supabase.

item.title: Markprompt and Supabase - GDPR-compliant AI chatbots for docs and websites.
item.description: AI-powered chatbot platform, Markprompt, empowers developers to deliver efficient and GDPR-compliant prompt experiences on top of their content, by leveraging Supabase's secure and privacy-focused vector database and authentication solutions.

item.title: Mendable switches from Pinecone to Supabase Vector for PostgreSQL vector embeddings.
item.description: How Mendable boosts efficiency and accuracy of chat powered search for documentation using Supabase Vector.

item.title: HappyTeams unlocks better performance and reduces cost with Supabase.
item.description: How a bootstrapped startup migrated from Heroku to Supabase in 30 minutes and never looked back.

item.title: Xendit use Supabase and create a full solution shipped to production in less than one week.
item.description: As a payment processor, Xendit are responsible for verifying that all transactions are legal.

item.title: Replenysh uses Supabase to implement OTP in less than 24 hours.
item.description: With Supabase, Replenysh gets a slick auth experience, reduces DevOps overhead, and continues to scale with Postgres.

item.title: How Mobbin migrated 200,000 users from Firebase for a better authentication experience.
item.description: Mobbin helps over 200,000 creators globally search and view the latest design patterns from well-known apps.

item.title: Epsilon3 digitize paper-based procedures in the space industry using telemetry data, simplifying testing and operations.
item.description: Epsilon3 uses Supabase to help teams execute secure and reliable operations in an industry where project spend runs into the billions.
